actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain agricultural employers a credit against income tax for a portion of wages paid to nonimmigrant H-2A workers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business tax credit for up to ten percent of the wages paid to nonimmigrant H-2A workers (temporary agricultural workers).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain agricultural employers a credit against income tax for a portion of wages paid to nonimmigrant H-2A workers.
